fudan-generative-vision/hallo2

Generates long 4K portrait animations from a single image and audio, with optional text prompts for expression control

Related repos

  • Audio-driven synthesis for portrait image animation
  • Generates mathematical animations from text prompts
  • Generative engine for creating interactive 3D worlds
  • multi-subject image generation with controllable identity and style
  • AI model for generating photos in different styles while keeping your face recognizable
  • turns static character images into controllable animations
  • Turn images into cinematic videos with 33 facial expressions and 400+ motion combinations
  • AI tool for turning cartoon images or sketches into smooth animations
